title: Reading Dog Nella
description:
Are you learning how to read just now, or do you find reading out loud difficult? Come and practice reading with a Reading Dog!

During a 15-minute reading session, you can read aloud to Reading Dog Nella. Nella listens patiently without criticising or interrupting. 

Reading Dog Nella takes appointments at Munkkiniemi Library on Wednesdays: 8.1, 29.1, 19.2, 12.3, 2.4, 7.5, 21.5, 11.6  from 6.00 to 7.05 pm.  Book your own reading time in the library's info or by telephone 09-31085033. 

Nella's trainer will be present at the session.

Kennelliittokoirat

title: Chess Club
description: The club is for players who already know the basics. Guidance available.

title: Pelataan lautapelejä (aikuisille ja nuorille)
description:
Tervetuloa pelaamaan erilaisia lautapelejä joka torstai klo 17-20! 
 
Martinlaakson kirjaston lautapelikerho on suunnattu nuorille ja aikuisille. Huomaathan että osassa peleistä tekstit ja säännöt ovat englanniksi. 
 
Kerhon järjestää Suomen lautapeliseura ry. 

Pelitietoa: lautapeliseura.fi 

Kuva: Pixabay.com

title: Open Storytime
description:
In the library's storytime we read stories to children aged 3-6.

The language of the storytime is Finnish.

title: Studion käytön opastus
description: Tule tutustumaan ohjatusti musiikkiosaston studioon, sen laitteisiin ja ohjelmistoihin.

title: Pingpong for youth
description:
The ping-pong club for youth every Friday in Kibe

from 5 pm to 6 pm. The instructor will introduce the techniques and gameplay of Ping-pong to the participants.

title: Lippulaiva library's movie screening for children
description:
Welcome to spend Friday evening with a movie together! Every Friday at 17:30, an open film screening is organized for children and families in Lippulaiva library's Salonki. The films are chosen together by voting based on the movies that the children has picked in the library.

The movies are all rated S or K7. Children often choose a K7 movie. The presentation language is Finnish. Subtitles are chosen according to the wishes of the children.

title: Iltasatutuokio
description:
Tervetuloa Malminkartanon kirjaston iltasatutuokioihin! Torstaisin alkaen 6. maaliskuuta klo 18.00 luemme satukirjoja perheen pienimmille.  Satutuokiotamme vetää vapaaehtoisemme, taianomainen satukertoja Timo!

 

Kutsumme  sekä lapset että heidän vanhempansa lämpimästi mukaan nauttimaan satujen lumosta. Tervetuloa!

title: Reading dog Kossi
description: Welcome to meet the reading dog Kossi in Sello's children's section. If you want to practice reading, Kossi is happy to listen and never barks or criticizes. Kossi likes to be petted and cuddled. Please reserve your turn at the Lastenmaa service counter

title: Ukrainian Children's Theater Masks
description:
What is theater?

A place for play and communication. There are no diaries where for each subject you get an assessment, because everyone is Excellent in the game. Here you can try, fantasize, show, experiment. We will only support freedom self-expression and prompting courage.

So, if your child dreams to perform on stage, and you want to see him enthusiastic and with shining eyes - bring them to us!

Your child will learn:

speak in front of the public

speak clearly and correctly

not to be afraid of the stage

express your thoughts out loud

to be able to concentrate, show and manage emotions

«use your head» for its intended purpose

be active and gambling

skillfully owns his body

During autumn 2024 the theater opens for children 8 -16 y.o. every Friday 17.00-18.30, except on 18.10.

Entresse library, Blue Room

You can sign up for the studio and get information about the training program by e-mail tatiana.divosvit@gmail.com and mob. +358413179903

title: The Carousel of Life - Roma Youth Photography
description:
The exhibition The Carousel of Life offers a unique opportunity to discover the life and culture of Roma youth from their own perspective, recorded through photographs. 

The photos were taken at the internationally renowned Gandhi High School photography club in Pécs, Hungary, whose students have won several awards. The photographs offer a glimpse into the daily lives, experiences and rich cultural heritage of young people.

Gandhi High School was founded in 1992 in Pécs and is the only Roma high school in Central Europe. Its aim is not only to provide high quality education, but also to preserve and develop Roma culture. The school also supports young people in their social integration and in pursuing higher education. Gandhi High School has been nurturing talented new generations for over 30 years.

 

Liszt Institute

8.5.-5.6.2025

Mon-Fri 10.00-18.00

Free entry

 

Welcome to the opening of the exhibition on 8.5. at 18.00 (pre-registration needed)

The exhibition will be opened by Hungarian Ambassador Klára Breuer. The opening will also be addressed by Dr János Sándor Horváth, Director General of the Office for Social Inclusion, and photographer Péter Marsalkó (Gandhi High School).

title: Lautapelikerho (aikuisille ja nuorille)
description:
Tervetuloa pelaamaan lautapelejä! Kerhoa vetää vapaaehtoinen Mikko, joka on juuri muuttanut Tapulikaupunkiin ja etsii peliseuraa. Etsitkö sinäkin?

Pelattavana on Mikon pelikokoelma, ja lisäksi voit tuoda oman suosikkipelisi ja opettaa sen muille. Myös kirjaston kokoelmaa saa hyödyntää. Kerho on suunnattu aikuisille ja nuorille.

Kerho kokoontuu kerran kuukaudessa torstaina klo 17–20. Kesän päivämäärät ovat: 22.5., 12.6., 10.7. ja 7.8.

Kuva: Tumisu, Pixabay

title: Children's Friday movie
description:
On Fridays at 17:00 in the library's youth area, there is an open cinema screening for children and families. Bring your own drinks and snacks!

On the first Friday of the month, we always show an age-appropriate film (S). On other Fridays, participants can choose a film from the S and K7 selection.

title: Iltasatutuokio
description:
Tervetuloa Malminkartanon kirjaston iltasatutuokioihin! Torstaisin alkaen 6. maaliskuuta klo 18.00 luemme satukirjoja perheen pienimmille.  Satutuokiotamme vetää vapaaehtoisemme, taianomainen satukertoja Timo!

 

Kutsumme  sekä lapset että heidän vanhempansa lämpimästi mukaan nauttimaan satujen lumosta. Tervetuloa!
